LanguageData.SK_Glowstone.label: 耀石灯
LanguageData.SK_Glowstone.description: Discover how to build beautiful lamps with the glowstones.
LanguageData.BagBeds.label: 餐厅家具 I
LanguageData.BagBeds.description: It opens the possibility of building some new furniture for dining room, such as Long Table and Stool.
LanguageData.SK_DiningRoomII.label: 餐厅家具 II
LanguageData.SK_DiningRoomII.description: It opens the possibility of building dining chairs in the dining room for the comfort of your colonists.
LanguageData.SK_DiningRoomIII.label: 餐厅家具 III
LanguageData.SK_DiningRoomIII.description: This research unlocks modern tables and serving tables for the dining room.
LanguageData.SK_DiningRoomIV.label: 餐厅家具 IV
LanguageData.SK_DiningRoomIV.description: This research unlocks beautiful dining chair for the dining room.
LanguageData.SK_RecreationRoomI.label: 休闲家具 I
LanguageData.SK_RecreationRoomI.description: Living out here is hard work, and some colonists may recall and old classic saying about "all work and no play..." This research will unlock some game designs and rules, such as the classic game of horseshoes.
LanguageData.SK_RecreationRoomII.label: 休闲家具 II
LanguageData.SK_RecreationRoomII.description: Further advancements in pleasure give your colonists the ability to build some boardgames, bookcases and couches.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: Recreation furniture room III
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.description: Even further advancements in pleasure give your colonists the ability to build some billiards and television.
LanguageData.SK_RecreationRoomIV.label: 休闲家具 IV
LanguageData.SK_RecreationRoomIV.description: Final research in pleasure and rest unlocks telescopes and better TVs.
LanguageData.Bedrolls.label: Medieval bedroom furniture
LanguageData.Bedrolls.description: It opens methods of obtaining rest in bedrooms by constructing comfy bed and end table.
LanguageData.Beds.label: Renaissance bedroom furniture
LanguageData.Beds.description: Renaissance bedroom advancements in rest give your colonists the ability to build some comfortable beds and reading tables.
LanguageData.SK_BedroomII.label: 皇家卧室家具
LanguageData.SK_BedroomII.description: Royal bedroom advancements in rest give your colonists the ability to build some Comfortable Beds and Reading Tables.
LanguageData.SK_BedroomIndustrial.label: 工业风卧室家具
LanguageData.SK_BedroomIndustrial.description: Industrial bedroom advancements in rest give your colonists the ability to build some Comfortable Beds and Reading Tables.
LanguageData.SK_BedroomIII.label: 奢华卧室家具
LanguageData.SK_BedroomIII.description: Even further advancements in rest give your colonists the ability to build some Armchairs and Luxury Beds.
LanguageData.SK_BedroomIV.label: 纳米时代卧室家具
LanguageData.SK_BedroomIV.description: Nanoelectronics research in pleasure and rest unlocks Comfy Seats and Stylish Beds.
LanguageData.SK_BedroomV.label: 宇航风格卧室家具
LanguageData.SK_BedroomV.description: Space research in pleasure and rest unlocks space and cryo beds.
LanguageData.SK_ErgonomicsI.label: 工效学 I
LanguageData.SK_ErgonomicsI.description: Advanced research in ergonomics allows building and construction of Small Tool Cabinet and some Cooking Tools to speed up work.
LanguageData.SK_ErgonomicsII.label: 工效学 II
LanguageData.SK_ErgonomicsII.description: Further research in ergonomics allows building and construction of File Cabinet and some Tool Cabinet to speed up work.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: Ergonomics III
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Even further research in ergonomics allows building and construction of Multi Analyzer.
LanguageData.SK_HygleneI.label: 卫生 I
LanguageData.SK_HygleneI.description: The first step in reducing infections and filth is to tame the consequences of your foot traffic. Some rugs would help.
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.label: Hygiene II
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.description: This allows colonists to build electric crematoriums, which can incinerate unwanted corpses, apparel and materials faster.
LanguageData.SK_StorageI.label: 存储设施 I
LanguageData.SK_StorageI.description: "So where did I put this pistol? What a mess!" \n Unlocks Feeding Bowl, Hamper and Pallet.
LanguageData.SK_StorageII.label: 存储设施 II
LanguageData.SK_StorageII.description: Further research in storage technologies allows building and construction of Cupboards, Shelves, Skip and Racks.
LanguageData.SK_StorageIII.label: 存储设施 III
LanguageData.SK_StorageIII.description: "Beam me up... Um, no seriously, how does this work?" \n"This is an advanced storage solution. When placed under a stockpile zone it will attempt to pile up adjacent items on top of itself, well over normal storage limits. Unlocks HazMat Container and Refrigerated Rack."
LanguageData.SK_TrainingFacilitiesI.label: 训练设施 I
LanguageData.SK_TrainingFacilitiesI.description: This allows colonists to construct some Autopsy Tables - doctors can hone their skills by testing their techniques on corpses; and Punching Bags - a man-able punching bag that your colonists can use to practice their melee skills with.
LanguageData.SK_TrainingFacilitiesII.label: 训练设施 II
LanguageData.SK_TrainingFacilitiesII.description: This allows colonists to construct some Holodecks - a man-able holosuite that your colonists can use to practice their social skills with.
LanguageData.FloorArt.label: 地板 I
LanguageData.FloorArt.description: The ability to make beautiful floor - is also an art. Tier 1.
LanguageData.FloorArtII.label: 地板 II
LanguageData.FloorArtII.description: The ability to make beautiful floor - is also an art. Tier 2.
LanguageData.FloorArtIII.label: 地板 III
LanguageData.FloorArtIII.description: The ability to make beautiful floor - is also an art. Tier 3.
LanguageData.FloorArtIV.label: 地板 IV
LanguageData.FloorArtIV.description: The ability to make beautiful floor - is also an art. Tier 4.
